name: 6th Side
description:
Made for GeoJam 2022

Shoot stuff and stand in zones that make you stronger! Be careful, the enemies also benefit from the zones!

Use WASD or a gamepad to move.

Mouse to AIM / Click to Shoot | Left stick to aim/shoot on gamepad.

BY:

TETRIS: MUSIC | t_up_2 TWITTER

ARI: ART | aridoesathing_ INSTAGRAM
